Title: Silverlight presence indicator
Description:
Custom control which lets you add presence indicators to your Silverlight 3 applications as well as direct access to the Communicator panel which lets you send IM/mail, schedule meetings and start video calls.

Requires Office Communicator to be installed and signed in.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Custom control which lets you add presence indicators to your Silverlight 3 applications as well as direct access to the Communicator panel which lets you send IM/mail, schedule meetings and start video calls.

Requires Office Communicator to be installed and signed in.

As this control makes use of the Name.dll, Microsoft Office is required to be installed. Its also worth mentioning that Office 2010 has a different Communicator panel than the previous versions.

http://zetitle.wordpress.com/2010/02/12/silverlight-presence-indicator/
